Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2005 04:02PM Jimmy2742 wrote: My mother just recently had a breast removed and now the doctor tells us that she had two lump nods with cancer as well. All of this is a shock to me and I still can't believe it. She must now do cemo. All of this from a 58 year old woman that I have never seen sick or miss a day of work. Could you help he understand a little bit of what she is thinking it is so hard for me to talk to her about it?
